- [#2241](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2241): Read cache in binary format. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2247](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2247): Fix auto-correct of `Performance/CaseWhenSplat` for percent arrays (`%w`, `%W`, `%i`, and `%I`). ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2244](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2244): Disregard annotation keywords in `Style/CommentAnnotation` if they don't start a comment. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2257](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2257): Fix bug where `Style/RescueEnsureAlignment` will register an offense for `rescue` and `ensure` on the same line. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2255](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2255): Refine the offense highlighting for `Style/SymbolProc`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#2260](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2260): Make `Exclude` in `.rubocop_todo.yml` work when running from a subdirectory. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Changes
- [#2248](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2248): Allow block-pass in `Style/AutoResourceCleanup`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2258](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2258): `Style/Documentation` will exclude test directories by default. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2260](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2260): Disable `Style/StringMethods` by default. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.34.1
body:
### Bug Fixes
- [#2212](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2212): Handle methods without parentheses in auto-correct. ([@karreiro](https://github.com/karreiro))
- [#2214](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2214): Fix `File name too long error` when `STDIN` option is provided. ([@mrfoto](https://github.com/mrfoto))
- [#2217](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2217): Allow block arguments in `Style/SymbolProc`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2213](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2213): Write to cache with binary encoding to avoid transcoding exceptions in some locales. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2218](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2218): Fix loading config error when safe yaml is only partially loaded. ([@maxjacobson](https://github.com/maxjacobson))
- [#2161](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2161): Allow an explicit receiver (except `Kernel`) in `Style/SignalException`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))

name: RuboCop 0.34
body:
Apart from the usual myriad of bugfixes, improvements and new cops,
this version introduces a results caching functionality. This
functionality will speed up tremendously consecutive RuboCop runs on
the same codebase.

Another news to share with you - the project now has a crowdfunding
campaign [here](https://salt.bountysource.com/teams/rubocop). If you like RuboCop
you might consider supporting its development.

Enjoy!

### New features
- [#2143](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2143): New cop `Performance/CaseWhenSplat` will identify and rearange `case` `when` statements that contain a `when` condition with a splat. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- New cop `Lint/DuplicatedKey` checks for duplicated keys in hashes, which Ruby 2.2 warns against. ([@sliuu](https://github.com/sliuu))
- [#2106](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2106): Add `SuspiciousParamNames` option to `Style/OptionHash`. ([@wli](https://github.com/wli))
- [#2193](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2193): `Style/Next` supports more `Enumerable` methods. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2179](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2179): Add `--list-target-files` option to CLI, which prints the files which will be inspected. ([@maxjacobson](https://github.com/maxjacobson))
- New cop `Style/MutableConstant` checks for assignment of mutable objects to constants. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `Style/RedudantFreeze` checks for usages of `Object#freeze` on immutable objects. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1924](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1924): New option `--cache` and configuration parameter `AllCops: UseCache` turn result caching on (default) or off. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2204](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2204): New cop `Style/StringMethods` will check for preferred method `to_sym` over `intern`. ([@imtayadeway](https://github.com/imtayadeway))

### Changes
- [#1351](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1351): Allow class emitter methods in `Style/MethodName`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2126](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2126): `Style/RescueModifier` can now auto-correct. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2109](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2109): Allow alignment with a token on the nearest line with same indentation in `Style/ExtraSpacing`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- `Lint/EndAlignment` handles the `case` keyword. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2146](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2146): Add STDIN support. ([@caseywebdev](https://github.com/caseywebdev))
- [#2175](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2175): Files that are excluded from a cop (e.g. using the `Exclude:` config option) are no longer being processed by that cop. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- `Rails/ActionFilter` now handles complete list of methods found in the Rails 4.2 [release notes](https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/4115a12da1409c753c747fd4bab6e612c0c6e51a/guides/source/4_2_release_notes.md#notable-changes-1). ([@MGerrior](https://github.com/MGerrior))
- [*2138](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2138): Change the offense in `Style/Next` to highlight the condition instead of the iteration. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- `Style/EmptyLineBetweenDefs` now handles class methods as well. ([@unmanbearpig](https://github.com/unmanbearpig))
- Improve handling of `super` in `Style/SymbolProc`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- `Style/SymbolProc` is applied to methods receiving arguments. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1839](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1839): Remove Rainbow monkey patching of String which conflicts with other gems like colorize. ([@daviddavis](https://github.com/daviddavis))
- `Style/HashSyntax` is now a bit faster when checking Ruby 1.9 syntax hash keys. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- `Lint/DeprecatedClassMethods` is now a whole lot faster. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- `Lint/BlockAlignment`, `Style/IndentationWidth`, and `Style/MultilineOperationIndentation` are now quite a bit faster. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))

### Bug Fixes
- [#2123](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2123): Fix handing of dynamic widths `Lint/FormatParameterMismatch`. ([@edmz](https://github.com/edmz))
- [#2116](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2116): Fix named params (using hash) `Lint/FormatParameterMismatch`. ([@edmz](https://github.com/edmz))
- [#2135](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2135): Ignore `super` and `zsuper` nodes in `Style/SymbolProc`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#2165](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2165): Fix a NPE in `Style/Alias`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#2168](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2168): Fix a NPE in `Rails/TimeZone`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#2169](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2169): Fix a NPE in `Rails/Date`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#2105](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2105): Fix a warning that was thrown when enabling `Style/OptionHash`. ([@wli](https://github.com/wli))
- [#2107](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2107): Fix auto-correct of `Style/ParallelAssignment` for nested expressions. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2111](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2111): Deal with byte order mark in `Style/InitialIndentation`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2113](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2113): Handle non-string tokens in `Style/ExtraSpacing`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2129](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2129): Handle empty interpolations in `Style/SpaceInsideStringInterpolation`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2119](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2119): Do not raise an error in `Style/RescueEnsureAlignment` and `Style/RescueModifier` when processing an excluded file. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2149](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2149): Do not register an offense in `Rails/Date` when `Date#to_time` is called with a time zone argument. ([@maxjacobson](https://github.com/maxjacobson))
- Do not register a `Rails/TimeZone` offense when using Time.new safely. ([@maxjacobson](https://github.com/maxjacobson))
- [#2124](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2124): Fix bug in `Style/EmptyLineBetweenDefs` when there are only comments between method definitions. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2154](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2154): `Performance/StringReplacement` can auto-correct replacements with backslash in them. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2009](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2009): Fix bug in `RuboCop::ConfigLoader.load_file` when `safe_yaml` is required. ([@eitoball](https://github.com/eitoball))
- [#2155](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2155): Configuration `EndAlignment: AlignWith: variable` only applies when the operands of `=` are on the same line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix bug in `Style/IndentationWidth` when `rescue` or `ensure` is preceded by an empty body. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2183](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2183): Fix bug in `Style/BlockDelimiters` when auto-correcting adjacent braces. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2199](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2199): Make `rubocop` exit with error when there are only `Lint/UnneededDisable` offenses. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix handling of empty parentheses when auto-correcting in `Style/SymbolProc`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))

name: RuboCop 0.33.0
body:
### New features
- [#2081](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2081): New cop `Style/Send` checks for the use of `send` and instead encourages changing it to `BasicObject#__send__` or `Object#public_send` (disabled by default). ([@syndbg](https://github.com/syndbg))
- [#2057](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2057): New cop `Lint/FormatParameterMismatch` checks for a mismatch between the number of fields expected in format/sprintf/% and what was pased to it. ([@edmz](https://github.com/edmz))
- [#2010](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2010): Add `space` style for SpaceInsideStringInterpolation. ([@gotrevor](https://github.com/gotrevor))
- [#2007](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2007): Allow any modifier before `def`, not only visibility modifiers. ([@fphilipe](https://github.com/fphilipe))
- [#1980](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1980): `--auto-gen-config` now outputs an excluded files list for failed cops (up to a maxiumum of 15 files). ([@bmorrall](https://github.com/bmorrall))
- [#2004](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2004): Introduced `--exclude-limit COUNT` to configure how many files `--auto-gen-config` will exclude. ([@awwaiid](https://github.com/awwaiid), [@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1918](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1918): New configuration parameter `AllCops:DisabledByDefault` when set to `true` makes only cops found in user configuration enabled, which makes cop selection _opt-in_. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- New cop `Performance/StringReplacement` checks for usages of `gsub` that can be replaced with `tr` or `delete`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2001](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2001): New cop `Style/InitialIndentation` checks for indentation of the first non-blank non-comment line in a file. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2060](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2060): New cop `Style/RescueEnsureAlignment` checks for bad alignment of `rescue` and `ensure` keywords. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- New cop `Style/OptionalArguments` checks for optional arguments that do not appear at the end of an argument list. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- New cop `Lint/CircularArgumentReference` checks for "circular argument references" in keyword arguments, which Ruby 2.2 warns against. ([@maxjacobson](https://github.com/maxjacobson), [@sliuu](https://github.com/sliuu))
- [#2030](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2030): New cop `Lint/OptionHash` checks for option hashes and encourages changing them to keyword arguments (disabled by default). ([@maxjacobson](https://github.com/maxjacobson))

### Changes
- [#2052](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2052): `Style/RescueModifier` uses token stream to identify offenses. ([@urbanautomaton](https://github.com/urbanautomaton.com))
- Rename `Rails/Date` and `Rails/TimeZone` style names to "strict" and "flexible" and make "flexible" to be default. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#2035](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2035): `Style/ExtraSpacing` is now enabled by default and has a configuration parameter `AllowForAlignment` that is `true` by default, making it allow extra spacing if it's used for alignment purposes. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Bugs fixed
- [#2014](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2014): Fix `Style/TrivialAccessors` to support AllowPredicates: false. ([@gotrevor](https://github.com/gotrevor))
- [#1988](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1988): Fix bug in `Style/ParallelAssignment` when assigning from `Module::CONSTANT`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1995](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1995): Improve message for `Rails/TimeZone`. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#1977](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1977): Fix bugs in `Rails/Date` and `Rails/TimeZone` when using namespaced Time/Date. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#1973](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1973): Do not register an offense in `Performance/Detect` when `select` is called on `Enumerable::Lazy`. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#2015](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2015): Fix bug occurring for auto-correction of a misaligned `end` in a file with only one method. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Allow string interpolation segments inside single quoted string literals when double quotes are preferred. ([@segiddins](https://github.com/segiddins))
- [#2026](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2026): Allow `Time.current` when style is "acceptable".([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#2029](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2029): Fix bug where `Style/RedundantReturn` auto-corrects returning implicit hashes to invalid syntax. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2021](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2021): Fix bug in `Style/BlockDelimiters` when a `semantic` expression is used in an array or a range. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1992](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1992): Allow parentheses in assignment to a variable with the same name as the method's in `Style/MethodCallParentheses`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2045](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2045): Fix crash in `Style/IndentationWidth` when using `private_class_method def self.foo` syntax. ([@unmanbearpig](https://github.com/unmanbearpig))
- [#2006](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2006): Fix crash in `Style/FirstParameterIndentation` in case of nested offenses. ([@unmanbearpig](https://github.com/unmanbearpig))
- [#2059](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2059): Don't check for trivial accessors in modules. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Add proper punctuation to the end of offense messages, where it is missing. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#2071](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2071): Keep line breaks in place on WordArray autocorrect.([@unmanbearpig](https://github.com/unmanbearpig))
- [#2075](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/2075): Properly correct `Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters` with escape characters in them. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2023](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2023): Avoid auto-correction corruption in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#2080](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2080): Properly parse code in `Performance/Count` when calling `select..count` in a class that extends an enumerable. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#2093](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/2093): Fix bug in `Style/OneLineConditional` which should not raise an offense with an 'if/then/end' statement. ([@sliuu](https://github.com/sliuu))

name: RuboCop 0.32.1
body:
### New features
- `Debugger` cop now checks catches methods called with arguments. ([@crazydog115](https://github.com/crazydog115))

### Bugs fixed
- Make it possible to disable `Lint/UnneededDisable`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1958](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1958): Show name of `Lint/UnneededDisable` when `-D/--display-cop-names` is given. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Do not show `Style/NonNilCheck` offenses as corrected when the source code is not modified. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- Fix auto-correct in `Style/RedundantReturn` when `return` has no arguments. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1955](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1955): Fix false positive for `Style/TrailingComma` cop. ([@mattjmcnaughton](https://github.com/mattjmcnaughton))
- [#1928](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1928): Avoid auto-correcting two alignment offenses in the same area at the same time. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1964](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1964): Fix `RedundantBegin` auto-correct issue with comments by doing a smaller correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1978](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1978): Don't count disabled offences if fail-level is autocorrect. ([@sch1zo](https://github.com/sch1zo))
- [#1986](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1986): Fix Date false positives on variables. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))

### Changes
- [#1708](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1708): Improve message for `FirstParameterIndentation`. ([@tejasbubane](https://github.com/tejasbubane))
- [#1959](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1959): Allow `Lint/UnneededDisable` to be inline disabled. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))

### New features
- Adjust behavior of `TrailingComma` cop to account for multi-line hashes nested within method calls. ([@panthomakos](https://github.com/panthomakos))
- [#1719](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1719): Display an error and abort the program if input file can't be found. ([@matugm](https://github.com/matugm))
- New cop `SpaceInsideStringInterpolation` checks for spaces within string interpolations. ([@glasnt](https://github.com/glasnt))
- New cop `NestedMethodDefinition` checks for method definitions inside other methods. ([@ojab](https://github.com/ojab))
- `LiteralInInterpolation` cop does auto-correction. ([@tmr08c](https://github.com/tmr08c))
- [#1865](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1865): New cop `Lint/UnneededDisable` checks for `rubocop:disable` comments that can be removed. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- `EmptyElse` cop does auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- Show reference links when displaying style guide links. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- `Debugger` cop now checks for the Capybara debug method `save_screenshot`. ([@crazydog115](https://github.com/crazydog115))
- [#1282](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1282): `CaseIndentation` cop does auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1928](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1928): Do auto-correction one offense at a time (rather than one cop at a time) if there are tabs in the code. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Changes
- Prefer `SpaceInsideBlockBraces` to `SpaceBeforeSemicolon` and `SpaceAfterSemicolon` to avoid an infinite loop when auto-correcting. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1873](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1873): Move `ParallelAssignment` cop from Performance to Style. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- Add `getlocal` to acceptable methods of `Rails/TimeZone`. ([@ojab](https://github.com/ojab))
- [#1851](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1851), [#1948](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1948): Change offense message for `ClassLength` and `ModuleLength` to match that of `MethodLength`. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))

### Bugs fixed
- Don't count required keyword args when specifying `CountKeywordArgs: false` for `ParameterLists`. ([@sumeet](https://github.com/sumeet))
- [#1879](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1879): Avoid auto-correcting hash with trailing comma into invalid code in `BracesAroundHashParameters`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1868](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1868): Do not register an offense in `Performance/Count` when `select` is called with symbols or strings as the parameters. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- `Sample` rewritten to properly handle shuffle randomness source, first/last params and non-literal ranges. ([@chastell](https://github.com/chastell))
- [#1873](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1873): Modify `ParallelAssignment` to properly autocorrect when the assignment is protected by a modifier statement. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- Configure `ParallelAssignment` to work with non-standard `IndentationWidths`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1899](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1899): Be careful about comments when auto-correcting in `BracesAroundHashParameters`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1897](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1897): Don't report that semicolon separated statements can be converted to modifier form in `IfUnlessModifier` (and don't auto-correct them). ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1644](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1644): Don't search the entire file system when a folder is named `,` (fix for jruby and rbx). ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1803](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1803): Don't warn for `return` from `lambda` block in `NonLocalExitFromIterator`. ([@ypresto](https://github.com/ypresto))
- [#1905](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1905): Ignore sparse and trailing comments in `Style/Documentation`. ([@RGBD](https://github.com/RGBD))
- [#1923](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1923): Handle properly `for` without body in `Style/Next`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1901](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1901): Do not auto correct comments that are missing a note. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1926](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1926): Fix crash in `Style/AlignHash` when correcting a hash with a splat in it. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1935](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1935): Allow `Symbol#to_proc` blocks in Performance/Size. ([@m1foley](https://github.com/m1foley))

name: RuboCop 0.31
body:
### New features
- `Rails/TimeZone` emits acceptable methods on a violation when `EnforcedStyle` is `:acceptable`. ([@l8nite](https://github.com/l8nite))
- Recognize rackup file (config.ru) out of the box. ([@carhartl](https://github.com/carhartl))
- [#1788](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1788): New cop `ModuleLength` checks for overly long module definitions. ([@sdeframond](https://github.com/sdeframond))
- New cop `Performance/Count` to convert `Enumerable#select...size`, `Enumerable#reject...size`, `Enumerable#select...count`, `Enumerable#reject...count` `Enumerable#select...length`, and `Enumerable#reject...length` to `Enumerable#count`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- `CommentAnnotation` cop does auto-correction. ([@dylandavidson](https://github.com/dylandavidson))
- New cop `Style/TrailingUnderscoreVariable` to remove trailing underscore variables from mass assignment. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1136](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1136): New cop `Performance/ParallelAssignment` to avoid usages of unnessary parallel assignment. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1278](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1278): `DefEndAlignment` and `EndAlignment` cops do auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- `IndentationWidth` cop follows the `AlignWith` option of the `DefEndAlignment` cop. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1837](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1837): New cop `EachWithObjectArgument` checks that `each_with_object` isn't called with an immutable object as argument. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- `ArrayJoin` cop does auto-correction. ([@tmr08c](https://github.com/tmr08c))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1816](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1816): Fix bug in `Sample` when calling `#shuffle` with something other than an element selector. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1768](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1768): `DefEndAlignment` recognizes preceding `private_class_method` or `public_class_method` before `def`. ([@til](https://github.com/til))
- [#1820](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1820): Correct the logic in `AlignHash` for when to ignore a key because it's not on its own line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1829](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1829): Fix bug in `Sample` and `FlatMap` that would cause them to report having been auto-corrected when they were not. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1832](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1832): Fix bug in `UnusedMethodArgument` that would cause them to report having been auto-corrected when they were not. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1834](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1834): Support only boolean values for `AutoCorrect` configuration parameter, and remove warning for unknown parameter. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1843](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1843): Fix crash in `TrailingBlankLines` when a file ends with a block comment without final newline. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1849](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1849): Fix bug where you can not have nested arrays in the Rake task configuration. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- Fix bug in `MultilineTernaryOperator` where it will not register an offense when only the false branch is on a separate line. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- Fix crash in `MultilineBlockLayout` when using new lambda literal syntax without parentheses. ([@hbd225](https://github.com/hbd225))
- [#1859](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1859): Fix bugs in `IfUnlessModifier` concerning comments and empty lines. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix handling of trailing comma in `SpaceAroundBlockParameters` and `SpaceAfterComma`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))

name: RuboCop 0.30.1
body:
Enjoy all those bug-fixes!

### Bugs fixed
- [#1691](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1691): For assignments with line break after `=`, use `keyword` alignment in `EndAlignment` regardless of configured style. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1769](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1769): Fix bug where `LiteralInInterpolation` registers an offense for interpolation of `__LINE__`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1773](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1773): Fix typo ('strptime' -> 'strftime') in `Rails/TimeZone`. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#1777](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1777): Fix offense message from Rails/TimeZone. ([@mzp](https://github.com/mzp))
- [#1784](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1784): Add an explicit error message when config contains an empty section. ([@bankair](https://github.com/bankair))
- [#1791](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1791): Fix autocorrection of `PercentLiteralDelimiters` with no content. ([@cshaffer](https://github.com/cshaffer))
- Fix handling of `while` and `until` with assignment in `IndentationWidth`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1793](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1793): Fix bug in `TrailingComma` that caused `,` in comment to count as a trailing comma. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1765](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1765): Update 1.9 hash to stop triggering when the symbol is not valid in the 1.9 hash syntax. ([@crimsonknave](https://github.com/crimsonknave))
- [#1806](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1806): Require a newer version of `parser` and use its corrected solution for comment association in `Style/Documentation`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1792](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1792): Fix bugs in `Sample` that did not account for array selectors with a range and passing random to shuffle. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1770](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1770): Add more acceptable methods to `Rails/TimeZone` (`utc`, `localtime`, `to_i`, `iso8601` etc). ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#1795](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1795): Fix bug in `TrailingBlankLines` that caused a crash for files containing only newlines. ([@renuo](https://github.com/renuo))

name: RuboCop 0.30.0
body:
Nothing ground-breaking this time around, but the release is pretty exciting non-the-less.
It packs a whole new category of cops (`Performance`) and a bunch of new Rails cops.
A lot of the existing cops got new customization options and we squashed a ton of bugs.

Thanks to everyone who contributed to this release!

### New features
- [#1600](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1600): Add `line_count_based` and `semantic` styles to the `BlockDelimiters` (formerly `Blocks`) cop. ([@clowder](https://github.com/clowder), [@mudge](https://github.com/mudge))
- [#1712](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1712): Set `Offense#corrected?` to `true`, `false`, or `nil` when it was, wasn't, or can't be auto-corrected, respectively. ([@vassilevsky](https://github.com/vassilevsky))
- [#1669](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1669): Add command-line switch `--display-style-guide`. ([@marxarelli](https://github.com/marxarelli))
- [#1405](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1405): Add Rails TimeZone and Date cops. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan))
- [#1641](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1641): Add ruby19_no_mixed_keys style to `HashStyle` cop. ([@iainbeeston](https://github.com/iainbeeston))
- [#1604](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1604): Add `IgnoreClassMethods` option to `TrivialAccessors` cop. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1651](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1651): The `Style/SpaceAroundOperators` cop now also detects extra spaces around operators. A list of operators that _may_ be surrounded by multiple spaces is configurable. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- Add auto-correct to `Encoding` cop. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1621](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1621): `TrailingComma` has a new style `consistent_comma`. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#1611](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1611): Add `empty`, `nil`, and `both` `SupportedStyles` to `EmptyElse` cop. Default is `both`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1611](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1611): Add new `MissingElse` cop. Default is to have this cop be disabled. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1602](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1602): Add support for `# :nodoc` in `Documentation`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1437](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1437): Modify `HashSyntax` cop to allow the use of hash rockets for hashes that have symbol values when using ruby19 syntax. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- New cop `Style/SymbolLiteral` makes sure you're not using the string within symbol syntax unless it's needed. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1657](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1657): Autocorrect can be turned off on a specific cop via the configuration. ([@jdoconnor](https://github.com/jdoconnor))
- New cop `Style/AutoResourceCleanup` suggests the use of block taking versions of methods that do resource cleanup. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1275](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1275): `WhileUntilModifier` cop does auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- New cop `Performance/ReverseEach` to convert `reverse.each` to `reverse_each`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1281](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1281): `IfUnlessModifier` cop does auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- New cop `Performance/Detect` to detect usage of `select.first`, `select.last`, `find_all.first`, and `find_all.last` and convert them to use `detect` instead. ([@palkan](https://github.com/palkan), [@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1728](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1728): New cop `NonLocalExitFromIterator` checks for misused `return` in block. ([@ypresto](https://github.com/ypresto))
- New cop `Performance/Size` to convert calls to `count` on `Array` and `Hash` to `size`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- New cop `Performance/Sample` to convert usages of `shuffle.first`, `shuffle.last`, and `shuffle[Fixnum]` to `sample`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- New cop `Performance/FlatMap` to convert `Enumerable#map...Array#flatten` and `Enumerable#collect...Array#flatten` to `Enumerable#flat_map`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1144](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1144): New cop `ClosingParenthesisIndentation` checks the indentation of hanging closing parentheses. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- New Rails cop `FindBy` identifies usages of `where.first` and `where.take`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New Rails cop `FindEach` identifies usages of `all.each`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1342](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1342): `IndentationConsistency` is now configurable with the styles `normal` and `rails`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1705](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1705): Fix crash when reporting offenses of `MissingElse` cop. ([@gerry3](https://github.com/gerry3))
- [#1659](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1659): Fix stack overflow with JRuby and Windows 8, during initial config validation. ([@pimterry](https://github.com/pimterry))
- [#1694](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1694): Ignore methods with a `blockarg` in `TrivialAccessors`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1617](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1617): Always read the html output template using utf-8. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1684](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1684): Ignore symbol keys like `:"string"` in `HashSyntax`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Handle explicit `begin` blocks in `Lint/Void`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Handle symbols in `Lint/Void`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1695](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1695): Fix bug with `--auto-gen-config` and `SpaceInsideBlockBraces`. ([@meganemura](https://github.com/meganemura))
- Correct issues with whitespace around multi-line lambda arguments. ([@zvkemp](https://github.com/zvkemp))
- [#1579](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1579): Fix handling of similar-looking blocks in `BlockAlignment`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1676](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1676): Fix auto-correct in `Lambda` when a new multi-line lambda is used as an argument. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1656](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1656): Fix bug that would include hidden directories implicitly. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1728](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1728): Fix bug in `LiteralInInterpolation` and `AssignmentInCondition`. ([@ypresto](https://github.com/ypresto))
- [#1735](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1735): Handle trailing space in `LineEndConcatenation` autocorrect. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1750](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1750): Escape offending code lines output by the HTML formatter in case they contain markup. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1541](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1541): No inspection of text that follows `__END__`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix comment detection in `Style/Documentation`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1637](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1637): Fix handling of `binding` calls in `UnusedBlockArgument` and `UnusedMethodArgument`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))

### Changes
- [#1397](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1397): `UnneededPercentX` renamed to `CommandLiteral`. The cop can be configured to enforce using either `%x` or backticks around command literals, or using `%x` around multi-line commands and backticks around single-line commands. The cop ignores heredoc commands. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#1020](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1020): Removed the `MaxSlashes` configuration option for `RegexpLiteral`. Instead, the cop can be configured to enforce using either `%r` or slashes around regular expressions, or using `%r` around multi-line regexes and slashes around single-line regexes. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#1734](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1734): The default exclusion of hidden directories has been optimized for speed. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1673](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1673): `Style/TrivialAccessors` now requires matching names by default. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.29.1
body:
### Bugs fixed
- [#1638](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1638): Use Parser functionality rather than regular expressions for matching comments in `FirstParameterIndentation`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1642](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1642): Raise the correct exception if the configuration file is malformed. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#1647](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1647): Skip `SpaceAroundBlockParameters` when lambda has no argument. ([@eitoball](https://github.com/eitoball))
- [#1649](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1649): Handle exception assignments in `UselessSetterCall`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1644](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1644): Don't search the entire file system when a folder is named `,`. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))

name: RuboCop 0.29.0
body:
### New features
- [#1430](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1430): Add `--except` option for disabling cops on the command line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1506](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1506): Add auto-correct from `EvenOdd` cop. ([@blainesch](https://github.com/blainesch))
- [#1507](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1507): `Debugger` cop now checks for the Capybara debug methods `save_and_open_page` and `save_and_open_screenshot`. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1539](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1539): Implement autocorrection for Rails/ReadWriteAttribute cop. ([@huerlisi](https://github.com/huerlisi))
- [#1324](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1324): Add `AllCops/DisplayCopNames` configuration option for showing cop names in reports, like `--display-cop-names`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1271](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1271): `Lambda` cop does auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1284](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1284): Support namespaces, e.g. `Lint`, in the arguments to `--only` and `--except`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1276](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1276): `SelfAssignment` cop does auto-correction. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- Add autocorrect to `RedundantException`. ([@mattjmcnaughton](https://github.com/mattjmcnaughton))
- [#1571](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1571): New cop `StructInheritance` checks for inheritance from Struct.new. ([@mmozuras](https://github.com/mmozuras))
- [#1575](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1575): New cop `DuplicateMethods` points out duplicate method name in class and module. ([@d4rk5eed](https://github.com/d4rk5eed))
- [#1144](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1144): New cop `FirstParameterIndentation` checks the indentation of the first parameter in a method call. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1627](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1627): New cop `SpaceAroundBlockParameters` checks the spacing inside and after block parameters pipes. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Changes
- [#1492](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1492): Abort when auto-correct causes an infinite loop. ([@dblock](https://github.com/dblock))
- Options `-e`/`--emacs` and `-s`/`--silent` are no longer recognized. Using them will now raise an error. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#1565](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1565): Let `--fail-level A` cause exit with error if all offenses are auto-corrected. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1309](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1309): Add argument handling to `MultilineBlockLayout`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1634](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1634): Fix `PerlBackrefs` Cop Autocorrections to Not Raise. ([@cshaffer](https://github.com/cshaffer))
- [#1553](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1553): Fix bug where `Style/EmptyLinesAroundAccessModifier` interfered with `Style/EmptyLinesAroundBlockBody` when there is and access modifier at the beginning of a block. ([@volkert](https://github.com/volkert))
- Handle element assignment in `Lint/AssignmentInCondition`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1484](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1484): Fix `EmptyLinesAroundAccessModifier` incorrectly finding a violation inside method calls with names identical to an access modifier. ([@dblock](https://github.com/dblock))
- Fix bug concerning `Exclude` properties inherited from a higher directory level. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1500](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1500): Fix crashing `--auto-correct --only IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1512](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1512): Fix false negative for typical string formatting examples. ([@kakutani](https://github.com/kakutani), [@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1504](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1504): Fail with a meaningful error if the configuration file is malformed. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- Fix bug where `auto_correct` Rake tasks does not take in the options specified in its parent task. ([@rrosenblum](https://github.com/rrosenblum))
- [#1054](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1054): Handle comments within concatenated strings in `LineEndConcatenation`. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama), [@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1527](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1527): Make autocorrect `BracesAroundHashParameter` leave the correct number of spaces. ([@mattjmcnaughton](https://github.com/mattjmcnaughton))
- [#1547](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1547): Don't print `[Corrected]` when auto-correction was avoided in `Style/Semicolon`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1573](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1573): Fix assignment-related auto-correction for `BlockAlignment`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1587](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1587): Exit with exit code 1 if there were errors ("crashing" cops). ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1574](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1574): Avoid auto-correcting `Hash.new` to `{}` when braces would be interpreted as a block. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1591](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1591): Don't check parameters inside `[]` in `MultilineOperationIndentation`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1509](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1509): Ignore class methods in `Rails/Delegate`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1594](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1594): Fix `@example` warnings in Yard Doc documentation generation. ([@mattjmcnaughton](https://github.com/mattjmcnaughton))
- [#1598](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1598): Fix bug in file inclusion when running from another directory. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1580](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1580): Don't print `[Corrected]` when auto-correction was avoided in `TrivialAccessors`. ([@lumeet](https://github.com/lumeet))
- [#1612](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1612): Allow `expand_path` on `inherit_from` in `.rubocop.yml`. ([@mattjmcnaughton](https://github.com/mattjmcnaughton))
- [#1610](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1610): Check that class method names actually match the name of the containing class/module in `Style/ClassMethods`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.28
body:
### New features
- New cop `ExtraSpacing` points out unnecessary spacing in files. ([@blainesch](https://github.com/blainesch))
- New cop `EmptyLinesAroundBlockBody` provides same functionality as the EmptyLinesAround(Class|Method|Module)Body but for blocks. ([@jcarbo](https://github.com/jcarbo))
- New cop `Style/EmptyElse` checks for empty `else`-clauses. ([@Koronen](https://github.com/Koronen))
- [#1454](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1454): New `--only-guide-cops` and `AllCops/StyleGuideCopsOnly` options that will only enforce cops that link to a style guide. ([@marxarelli](https://github.com/marxarelli))

### Changes
- [#801](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/801): New style `context_dependent` for `Style/BracesAroundHashParameters` looks at preceding parameter to determine if braces should be used for final parameter. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1427](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1427): Excluding directories on the top level is now done earlier, so that these file trees are not searched, thus saving time when inspecting projects with many excluded files. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1325](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1325): When running with `--auto-correct`, only offenses _that can not be corrected_ will result in a non-zero exit code. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1445](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1445): Allow sprockets directive comments (starting with `#=`) in `Style/LeadingCommentSpace`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

### Bugs fixed
- Fix `%W[]` auto corrected to `%w(]`. ([@toy](https://github.com/toy))
- Fix Style/ElseAlignment Cop to find the right parent on def/rescue/else/ensure/end. ([@oneamtu](https://github.com/oneamtu))
- [#1181](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1181): _(fix again)_ `Style/StringLiterals` cop stays away from strings inside interpolated expressions. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1441](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1441): Correct the logic used by `Style/Blocks` and other cops to determine if an auto-correction would alter the meaning of the code. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1449](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1449): Handle the case in `MultilineOperationIndentation` where instances of both correct style and unrecognized (plain wrong) style are detected during an `--auto-gen-config` run. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1456](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1456): Fix autocorrect in `SymbolProc` when there are multiple offenses on the same line. ([@jcarbo](https://github.com/jcarbo))
- [#1459](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1459): Handle parenthesis around the condition in `--auto-correct` for `NegatedWhile`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1465](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1465): Fix autocorrect of code like `#$1` in `PerlBackrefs`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Fix autocorrect of code like `#$:` in `SpecialGlobalVars`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1466](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1466): Allow leading underscore for unused parameters in `SingleLineBlockParams`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1470](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1470): Handle `elsif` + `else` in `ElseAlignment`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1474](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1474): Multiline string with both `<<` and `\` caught by `Style/LineEndConcatenation` cop. ([@katieschilling](https://github.com/katieschilling))
- [#1485](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1485): Ignore procs in `SymbolProc`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1473](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1473): `Style/MultilineOperationIndentation` doesn't recognize assignment to array/hash element. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

name: RuboCop 0.27.1
body:
### Changes
- [#1343](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1343): Remove auto-correct from `RescueException` cop. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1425](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1425): `AllCops/Include` configuration parameters are only taken from the project `.rubocop.yml` and files it inherits from, not from `.rubocop.yml` files in subdirectories. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1411](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1411): Handle lambda calls without a selector in `MultilineOperationIndentation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1401](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1401): Files in hidden directories, i.e. ones beginning with dot, can now be selected through configuration, but are still not included by default. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1415](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1415): String literals concatenated with backslashes are now handled correctly by `StringLiteralsInInterpolation`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1416](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1416): Fix handling of `begin/rescue/else/end` in `ElseAlignment`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1413](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1413): Support empty elsif branches in `MultilineIfThen`. ([@janraasch](https://github.com/janraasch), [@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1406](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1406): Allow a newline in `SpaceInsideRangeLiteral`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.27.0
body:
### New features
- [#1348](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1348): New cop `ElseAlignment` checks alignment of `else` and `elsif` keywords. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1321](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1321): New cop `MultilineOperationIndentation` checks indentation/alignment of binary operations if they span more than one line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1077](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1077): New cop `Metrics/AbcSize` checks the ABC metric, based on assignments, branches, and conditions. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054), [@jfelchner](https://github.com/jfelchner))
- [#1352](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1352): `WordArray` is now configurable with the `WordRegex` option. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#1181](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1181): New cop `Style/StringLiteralsInInterpolation` checks quotes inside interpolated expressions in strings. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#872](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/872): `Style/IndentationWidth` is now configurable with the `Width` option. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1396](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1396): Include `.opal` files by default. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#771](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/771): Three new `Style` cops, `EmptyLinesAroundMethodBody` , `EmptyLinesAroundClassBody` , and `EmptyLinesAroundModuleBody` replace the `EmptyLinesAroundBody` cop. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Changes
- [#1084](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1084): Disabled `Style/CollectionMethods` by default. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

### Bugs fixed
- `AlignHash` no longer skips multiline hashes that contain some elements on the same line. ([@mvz](https://github.com/mvz))
- [#1349](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1349): `BracesAroundHashParameters` no longer cleans up whitespace in autocorrect, as these extra corrections are likely to interfere with other cops' corrections. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1350](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1350): Guard against `Blocks` cop introducing syntax errors in auto-correct. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1374](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1374): To eliminate interference, auto-correction is now done by one cop at a time, with saving and re-parsing inbetween. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1388](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1388): Fix a false positive in `FormatString`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1389](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1389): Make `--out` to create parent directories. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- Refine HTML formatter. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1410](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1410): Handle specially Java primitive type references in `ColonMethodCall`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.26.1
body:
RuboCop 0.26.1 is a bugfix-only release. Below is a list of the bugs we've fixed since 0.26.0:

### Bugs fixed
- [#1326](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1326): Fix problem in `SpaceInsideParens` with detecting space inside parentheses used for grouping expressions. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1335](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1335): Restrict URI schemes permitted by `LineLength` when `AllowURI` is enabled. ([@smangelsdorf](https://github.com/smangelsdorf))
- [#1339](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1339): Handle `eql?` and `equal?` in `OpMethod`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1340](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1340): Fix crash in `Style/SymbolProc` cop when the block calls a method with no explicit receiver. ([@smangelsdorf](https://github.com/smangelsdorf))

name: RuboCop 0.26.0
body:
Nothing particularly exciting this time around.  The new release comes
with lots of bug fixes, more auto-corrections and several new cops.

Note that the `Style/Encoding` cop is now disabled by default. See
[#1304](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1304) for the rationale behind this change.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- New formatter `HTMLFormatter` generates a html file with a list of files with offences in them. ([@SkuliOskarsson](https://github.com/SkuliOskarsson))
- New cop `SpaceInsideRangeLiteral` checks for spaces around `..` and `...` in range literals. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `InfiniteLoop` checks for places where `Kernel#loop` should have been used. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `SymbolProc` checks for places where a symbol can be used as proc instead of a block. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `UselessAssignment` cop now suggests a variable name for possible typos if there's a variable-ish identifier similar to the unused variable name in the same scope. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- `PredicateName` cop now has separate configurations for prefices that denote predicate method names and predicate prefices that should be removed. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1272](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1272): `Tab` cop does auto-correction. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- [#1274](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1274): `MultilineIfThen` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1279](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1279): `DotPosition` cop does auto-correction. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- [#1277](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1277): `SpaceBeforeFirstArg` cop does auto-correction. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- [#1310](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1310): Handle `module_function` in `Style/AccessModifierIndentation` and `Style/EmptyLinesAroundAccessModifier`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

### Changes
- [#1289](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1289): Use utf-8 as default encoding for inspected files. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1304](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1304): `Style/Encoding` is no longer a no-op on Ruby 2.x. It's also disabled by default, as projects not supporting 1.9 don't need to run it. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1263](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1263): Do not report `%W` literals with special escaped characters in `UnneededCapitalW`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1286](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1286): Fix a false positive in `VariableName`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1211](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1211): Fix false negative in `UselessAssignment` when there's a reference for the variable in an exclusive branch. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1307](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1307): Fix auto-correction of `RedundantBegin` cop deletes new line. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- [#1283](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1283): Fix auto-correction of indented expressions in `PercentLiteralDelimiters`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1315](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1315): `BracesAroundHashParameters` auto-correction removes whitespace around content inside braces. ([@jspanjers](https://github.com/jspanjers))
- [#1313](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1313): Fix a false positive in `AndOr` when enforced style is `conditionals`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Handle post-conditional `while` and `until` in `AndOr` when enforced style is `conditionals`. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1319](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1319): Fix a false positive in `FormatString`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1287](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1287): Allow missing blank line for EmptyLinesAroundAccessModifier if next line closes a block. ([@sch1zo](https://github.com/sch1zo))

name: RuboCop 0.25.0
body:
This release comes with lots of bug fixes and several new cops (that will likely need bugfixes in the next release :-)).

The most notable change in 0.25 is the addition of the `Metrics` namespace. Several `Style` cops have been moved there
(e.g. `ClassLength`, `MethodLength`, etc).

This release also marks the end of us supporting Ruby 1.9.2 - now Ruby 1.9.3+ is required.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- [#1259](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1259): Allow AndOr cop to autocorrect by adding method call parenthesis. ([@vrthra](https://github.com/vrthra))
- [#1232](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1232): Add EnforcedStyle option to cop `AndOr` to restrict it to conditionals. ([@vrthra](https://github.com/vrthra))
- [#835](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/835): New cop `PercentQLiterals` checks if use of `%Q` and `%q` matches configuration. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#835](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/835): New cop `BarePercentLiterals` checks if usage of `%()` or `%Q()` matches configuration. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1079](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1079): New cop `MultilineBlockLayout` checks if a multiline block has an extpression on the same line as the start of the block. ([@barunio](https://github.com/barunio))
- [#1217](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1217): `Style::EmptyLinesAroundAccessModifier` cop does auto-correction. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#1220](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1220): New cop `PerceivedComplexity` is similar to `CyclomaticComplexity`, but reports when methods have a high complexity for a human reader. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- `Debugger` cop now checks for `binding.pry_remote`. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- [#1238](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1238): Add `MinBodyLength` option to `Next` cop. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1241](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1241): `TrailingComma` cop does auto-correction. ([@yous](https://github.com/yous))
- [#1078](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1078): New cop `BlockEndNewline` checks if the end statement of a multiline block is on its own line. ([@barunio](https://github.com/barunio))
- [#1078](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1078): `BlockAlignment` cop does auto-correction. ([@barunio](https://github.com/barunio))

### Changes
- [#1220](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1220): New namespace `Metrics` created and some `Style` cops moved there. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Drop support for Ruby 1.9.2 in accordance with [the end of the security maintenance extension](https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/news/2014/07/01/eol-for-1-8-7-and-1-9-2/). ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1251](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1251): Fix `PercentLiteralDelimiters` auto-correct indentation error. ([@hannestyden](https://github.com/hannestyden))
- [#1197](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1197): Fix false positive for new lambda syntax in `SpaceInsideBlockBraces`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1201](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1201): Fix error at anonymous keyword splat arguments in some variable cops. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- Fix false positive in `UnneededPercentQ` for `/%Q(something)/`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix `SpacesInsideBrackets` for `Hash#[]` calls with spaces after left bracket. ([@mcls](https://github.com/mcls))
- [#1210](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1210): Fix false positive in `UnneededPercentQ` for `%Q(\t")`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix false positive in `UnneededPercentQ` for heredoc strings with `%q`/`%Q`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1214](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1214): Don't destroy code in `AlignHash` autocorrect. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1219](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1219): Don't report bad alignment for `end` or `}` in `BlockAlignment` if it doesn't begin its line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1227](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1227): Don't permanently change yamler as it can affect other apps. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1184](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1184): Fix a false positive in `Output` cop. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1256](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1256): Ignore block-pass in `TrailingComma`. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#1255](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1255): Compare without context in `AutocorrectUnlessChangingAST`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1262](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1262): Handle regexp and backtick literals in `VariableInterpolation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.24.1
body:
RuboCop 0.24.1 is a bugfix-only release. Below is a list of the bugs we've fixed since 0.24.0:

### Bugs fixed
- [#1174](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1174): Fix `--auto-correct` crash in `AlignParameters`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1176](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1176): Fix `--auto-correct` crash in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1177](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1177): Avoid suggesting underscore-prefixed name for unused keyword arguments and auto-correcting in that way. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1157](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1157): Validate `--only` arguments later when all cop names are known. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1188](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1188), [#1190](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1190): Fix crash in `LineLength` cop when `AllowURI` option is enabled. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1191](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1191): Fix crash on empty body branches in a loop in `Next` cop. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))

name: RuboCop 0.24.0
body:
This release is mostly about fixing bugs, but it also features a few new cops.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- [#639](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/639): Support square bracket setters in `UselessSetterCall`. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#835](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/835): `UnneededCapitalW` cop does auto-correction. ([@sfeldon](https://github.com/sfeldon))
- [#1092](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1092): New cop `DefEndAlignment` takes over responsibility for checkng alignment of method definition `end`s from `EndAlignment`, and is configurable. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1145](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1145): New cop `ClassCheck` enforces consistent use of `is_a?` or `kind_of?`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1161](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1161): New cop `SpaceBeforeComma` detects spaces before a comma. ([@agrimm](https://github.com/agrimm))
- [#1161](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1161): New cop `SpaceBeforeSemicolon` detects spaces before a semicolon. ([@agrimm](https://github.com/agrimm))
- [#835](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/835): New cop `UnneededPercentQ` checks for usage of the `%q`/`%Q` syntax when `''` or `""` would do. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#977](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/977): Add `AllowURI` option (enabled by default) to `LineLength` cop. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))

### Changes
- Unused block local variables (`obj.each { |arg; this| }`) are now handled by `UnusedBlockArgument` cop instead of `UselessAssignment` cop. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1141](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1141): Clarify in the message from `TrailingComma` that a trailing comma is never allowed for lists where some items share a line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1133](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1133): Handle `reduce/inject` with no arguments in `EachWithObject`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1152](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1152): Handle `while/until` with no body in `Next`. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- Fix a false positive in `UselessSetterCall` for setter call on a local variable that contains a non-local object. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1158](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1158): Fix auto-correction of floating-point numbers. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1159](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1159): Fix checking of `begin`..`end` structures, blocks, and parenthesized expressions in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1159](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1159): More rigid conditions for when `attr` is considered an offense. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1167](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1167): Fix handling of parameters spanning multiple lines in `TrailingComma`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1169](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1169): Fix handling of ternary op conditions in `ParenthesesAroundCondition`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1147](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1147): WordArray checks arrays with special characters. ([@camilleldn](https://github.com/camilleldn))
- Fix a false positive against `return` in a loop in `Next` cop. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#1165](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1165): Support `rescue`/`else`/`ensure` bodies in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix false positive for aligned list of values after `when` in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

name: RuboCop 0.23.0
body:
This release is mostly about fixing bugs, but it also features a few prominent changes:
- Cops are now namespace aware, which would it make it simpler to write RuboCop extensions without
  worrying about name collisions (e.g. you can now have `Style/Filename` and `RSpec/Filename` cops).
- There's now logic which prevents auto-corrections from generated invalid Ruby code.
- The `Rubocop` module was renamed to `RuboCop`, which will affect packages relying on RuboCop's public API.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- [#1117](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1117): `BlockComments` cop does auto-correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1124](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1124): `TrivialAccessors` cop auto-corrects class-level accessors. ([@ggilder](https://github.com/ggilder))
- [#1062](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1062): New cop `InlineComment` checks for inline comments. ([@salbertson](https://github.com/salbertson))
- [#1118](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1118): Add checking and auto-correction of right brackets in `IndentArray` and `IndentHash`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Changes
- [#1097](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1097): Add optional namespace prefix to cop names: `Style/LineLength` instead of `LineLength` in config files, `--only` argument, `--show-cops` output, and `# rubocop:disable`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1075](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1075): More strict limits on when to require trailing comma. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Renamed `Rubocop` module to `RuboCop`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

### Bugs fixed
- [#1126](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1126): Fix `--auto-gen-config` bug with `RegexpLiteral` where only the last file's results would be used. ([@ggilder](https://github.com/ggilder))
- [#1104](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1104): Fix `EachWithObject` with modifier if as body. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#1106](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1106): Fix `EachWithObject` with single method call as body. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- Avoid the warning about ignoring syck YAML engine from JRuby. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1111](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1111): Fix problem in `EndOfLine` with reading non-UTF-8 encoded files. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1115](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1115): Fix `Next` to ignore super nodes. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#1117](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1117): Don't auto-correct indentation in scopes that contain block comments (`=begin`..`=end`). ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1123](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1123): Support setter calls in safe assignment in `ParenthesesAroundCondition`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1090](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1090): Correct handling of documentation vs annotation comment. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1118](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1118): Never write invalid ruby to a file in auto-correct. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1120](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1120): Don't change indentation of heredoc strings in auto-correct. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1109](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1109): Handle conditions with modifier ops in them in `ParenthesesAroundCondition`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.22.0
body:
This release brings a few new cops, extended auto-correction support and plenty of bug fixes.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- [#974](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/974): New cop `CommentIndentation` checks indentation of comments. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Add new cop `EachWithObject` to prefer `each_with_object` over `inject` or `reduce`. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#1010](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1010): New Cop `Next` check for conditions at the end of an interation and propose to use `next` instead. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- The `GuardClause` cop now also looks for unless and it is configurable how many lines the body of an if / unless needs to have to not be ignored. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#835](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/835): New cop `UnneededPercentX` checks for `%x` when backquotes would do. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Add auto-correct to `UnusedBlockArgument` and `UnusedMethodArgument` cops. ([@hannestyden](https://github.com/hannestyden))
- [#1074](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1074): New cop `SpaceBeforeComment` checks for missing space between code and a comment on the same line. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1089](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/1089): New option `-F`/`--fail-fast` inspects files in modification time order and stop after the first file with offenses. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Changes
- `NonNilCheck` offense reporting and autocorrect are configurable to include semantic changes. ([@hannestyden](https://github.com/hannestyden))
- The parameters `AllCops/Excludes` and `AllCops/Includes` with final `s` only give a warning and don't halt `rubocop` execution. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- The `GuardClause` cop is no longer irgnoring a one-line body by default - see configuration. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#1050](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1050): Rename `rubocop-todo.yml` file to `.rubocop_todo.yml`. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#1064](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1064): Adjust default max line length to 80. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

### Bugs fixed
- Allow assignment in `AlignParameters` cop. ([@tommeier](https://github.com/tommeier))
- Fix `Void` and `SpaceAroundOperators` for short call syntax `lambda.()`. ([@biinari](https://github.com/biinari))
- Fix `Delegate` for delegation with assignment or constant. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- [#1032](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1032): Avoid duplicate reporting when code moves around due to `--auto-correct`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1036](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1036): Handle strings like `__FILE__` in `LineEndConcatenation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1006](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1006): Fix LineEndConcatenation to handle chained concatenations. ([@barunio](https://github.com/barunio))
- [#1066](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1066): Fix auto-correct for `NegatedIf` when the condition has parentheses around it. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix `AlignParameters` `with_fixed_indentation` for multi-line method calls. ([@molawson](https://github.com/molawson))
- Fix problem that appears in some installations when reading empty YAML files. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1022](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1022): A Cop will no longer auto-correct a file that's excluded through an `Exclude` setting in the cop's configuration. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix paths in `Exclude` config section not being recognized on Windows. ([@wndhydrnt](https://github.com/wndhydrnt))
- [#1094](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1094): Fix ClassAndModuleChildren for classes with a single method. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))

name: RuboCop 0.21.0
body:
This release brings a few new cops and extended auto-correction support. The most significant
change is that we've changed the syntax for excluding/including to be closer to that of shell globbing.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- [#835](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/835): New cop `UnneededCapitalW` checks for `%W` when interpolation not necessary and `%w` would do. ([@sfeldon](https://github.com/sfeldon))
- [#934](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/934): New cop `UnderscorePrefixedVariableName` checks for `_`-prefixed variables that are actually used. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#934](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/934): New cop `UnusedMethodArgument` checks for unused method arguments. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#934](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/934): New cop `UnusedBlockArgument` checks for unused block arguments. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
