- [#964](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/964): `RedundantBegin` cop does auto-correction. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#966](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/966): `RescueException` cop does auto-correction. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#967](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/967): `TrivialAccessors` cop does auto-correction. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#963](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/963): Add `AllowDSLWriters` options to `TrivialAccessors`. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#969](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/969): Let the `Debugger` cop check for forgotten calls to byebug. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#971](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/971): Configuration format deprecation warnings include the path to the problematic config file. ([@bcobb](https://github.com/bcobb))
- [#490](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/490): Add EnforcedStyle config option to TrailingBlankLines. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Add `auto_correct` task to Rake integration. ([@irrationalfab](https://github.com/irrationalfab))
- [#986](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/986): The `--only` option can take a comma-separated list of cops. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- New Rails cop `Delegate` that checks for delegations that could be replaced by the `delegate` method. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))
- Add configuration to `Encoding` cop to only enforce encoding comment if there are non ASCII characters. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))

### Changes
- Removed `FinalNewline` cop as its check is now performed by `TrailingBlankLines`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1011](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1011): Pattern matching with `Dir#[]` for config parameters added. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Bugs fixed
- Update description on `LineEndConcatenation` cop. ([@mockdeep](https://github.com/mockdeep))
- [#978](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/978): Fix regression in `IndentationWidth` handling method calls. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#976](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/976): Fix `EndAlignment` not handling element assignment correctly. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#976](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/976): Fix `IndentationWidth` not handling element assignment correctly. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- [#800](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/800): Do not report `[Corrected]` in `--auto-correct` mode if correction wasn't done. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#968](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/968): Fix bug when running Rubocop with `-c .rubocop.yml`. ([@bquorning](https://github.com/bquorning))
- [#975](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/975): Fix infinite correction in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#986](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/986): When `--lint` is used together with `--only`, all lint cops are run in addition to the given cops. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#997](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/997): Fix handling of file paths for matching against `Exclude` property when `rubocop .` is called. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1000](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1000): Support modifier (e.g., `private`) and `def` on the same line (Ruby >= 2.1) in `IndentationWidth`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1001](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1001): Fix `--auto-gen-config` logic for `RegexpLiteral`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#993](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/993): Do not report any offenses for the contents of an empty file. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#1016](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1016): Fix a false positive in `ConditionPosition` regarding statement modifiers. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#1014](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/1014): Fix handling of strings nested in `dstr` nodes. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.20.1
body:
RuboCop 0.20.1 is a bugfix-only release. Below is a list of the bugs we've fixed since 0.20.0:

## 0.20.1 (05/04/2014)

### Bugs fixed
- [#940](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/940): Fixed `UselessAccessModifier` not handling `attr_*` correctly. ([@fshowalter](https://github.com/fshowalter))
- `NegatedIf` properly handles negated `unless` condition. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `NegatedWhile` properly handles negated `until` condition. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#925](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/925): Do not disable the `Syntax` cop in output from `--auto-gen-config`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#943](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/943): Fix auto-correction interference problem between `SpaceAfterComma` and other cops. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#954](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/954): Fix auto-correction bug in `NilComparison`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#953](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/953): Fix auto-correction bug in `NonNilCheck`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#952](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/952): Handle implicit receiver in `StringConversionInInterpolation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#956](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/956): Apply `ClassMethods` check only on `class`/`module` bodies. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#945](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/945): Fix SpaceBeforeFirstArg cop for multiline argument and exclude assignments. ([@cschramm](https://github.com/cschramm))
- [#948](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/948): `Blocks` cop avoids auto-correction if it would introduce a semantic change. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#946](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/946): Allow non-nil checks that are the final expressions of predicate method definitions in `NonNilCheck`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#957](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/957): Allow space + comment inside parentheses, braces, and square brackets. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

name: RuboCop 0.20.0
body:
There aren't many exciting new features this time around - our focus in 0.20 has been fixing most of the problems we introduced in 0.19. Apart from that we've added a few new cops and implemented auto-correct for a bunch of the existing cops.

You'll also notice that the messages produced by most formatters a bit more colorful (and hopefully more readable as well).

You should also note that `AllCops/Includes` and `AllCops/Excludes` have been renamed, so you'll have to update your config files accordingly.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

### New features
- New cop `GuardClause` checks for conditionals that can be replaced by guard clauses. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `EmptyInterpolation` checks for empty interpolation in double-quoted strings. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#899](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/899): Make `LineEndConcatenation` cop `<<` aware. ([@mockdeep](https://github.com/mockdeep))
- [#896](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/896): New option `--fail-level` changes minimum severity for exit with error code. ([@hiroponz](https://github.com/hiroponz))
- [#893](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/893): New option `--force-exclusion` forces excluding files specified in the configuration `Exclude` even if they are explicitly passed as arguments. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- `VariableInterpolation` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `Not` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `ClassMethods` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `StringConversionInInterpolation` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `NilComparison` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `NonNilComparison` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `NegatedIf` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- `NegatedWhile` cop does auto-correction. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New lint cop `SpaceBeforeFirstArg` checks for space between the method name and the first argument in method calls without parentheses. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- New style cop `SingleSpaceBeforeFirstArg` checks that no more than one space is used between the method name and the first argument in method calls without parentheses. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- New formatter `disabled_lines` displays cops and line ranges disabled by inline comments. ([@fshowalter](https://github.com/fshowalter))
- New cop `UselessAccessModifiers` checks for access modifiers that have no effect. ([@fshowalter](https://github.com/fshowalter))

### Changes
- [#913](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/913): `FileName` accepts multiple extensions. ([@tamird](https://github.com/tamird))
- `AllCops/Excludes` and `AllCops/Includes` were renamed to `AllCops/Exclude` and `AllCops/Include` for consistency with standard cop params. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Extract `NonNilCheck` cop from `NilComparison`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `FavorJoin` to `ArrayJoin`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `FavorUnlessOverNegatedIf` to `NegatedIf`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `FavorUntilOverNegatedWhile`to `NegatedWhile`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `HashMethods` to `DeprecatedHashMethods`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `ReadAttribute` to `ReadWriteAttribute` and extended it to check for uses of `write_attribute`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Add experimental support for Ruby 2.2 (development version) by falling back to Ruby 2.1 parser. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))

### Bugs fixed
- [#926](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/926): Fixed `BlockNesting` not auto-generating correctly. ([@tmorris-fiksu](https://github.com/tmorris-fiksu))
- [#904](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/904): Fixed a NPE in `LiteralInInterpolation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#904](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/904): Fixed a NPE in `StringConversionInInterpolation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#892](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/892): Make sure `Include` and `Exclude` paths in a `.rubocop.yml` are interpreted as relative to the directory of that file. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#906](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/906): Fixed a false positive in `LiteralInInterpolation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#909](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/909): Handle properly multiple `rescue` clauses in `SignalException`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#876](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/876): Do a deep merge of hashes when overriding default configuration in a `.rubocop.yml` file. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#912](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/912): Fix a false positive in `LineEndConcatenation` for `%` string literals. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#912](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/912): Handle top-level constant resolution in `DeprecatedClassMethods` (e.g. `::File.exists?`). ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#914](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/914): Fixed rdoc error during gem installation. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- The `--only` option now enables the given cop in case it is disabled in configuration. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix path resolution so that the default exclusion of `vendor` directories works. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#908](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/908): Fixed hanging while auto correct for `SpaceAfterComma` and `SpaceInsideBrackets`. ([@hiroponz](https://github.com/hiroponz))
- [#919](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/919): Don't avoid auto-correction in `HashSyntax` when there is missing space around operator. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fixed handling of floats in `NumericLiterals`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#927](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/927): Let `--auto-gen-config` overwrite an existing `rubocop-todo.yml` file instead of asking the user to remove it. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#936](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/936): Allow `_other` as well as `other` in `OpMethod`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.19.1
body:
RuboCop 0.19.1 is a bugfix-only release. Below is a list of the bugs we've fixed since 0.19.0:

### Bugs fixed
- [#884](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/884): Fix --auto-gen-config for `NumericLiterals` so MinDigits is correct. ([@tmorris-fiksu](https://github.com/tmorris-fiksu))
- [#879](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/879): Fix --auto-gen-config for `RegexpLiteral` so we don't generate illegal values for `MaxSlashes`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix the name of the `Include` param in the default config of the Rails cops. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#878](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/pull/878): Blacklist `Rakefile`, `Gemfile` and `Capfile` by default in the `FileName` cop. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#875](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/875): Handle `separator` style hashes in `IndentHash`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix a bug where multiple cli options that result in exit can be specified at once (e.g. `-vV`, `-v --show-cops`). ([@jkogara](https://github.com/jkogara))
- [#889](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/889): Fix a false positive for `LiteralInCondition` when the condition is non-primitive array. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))

name: RuboCop 0.19.0
body:
This is the biggest RuboCop release we've done in a while. The highlights include
about a dozen new cops, more cop configuration options, improved auto-correct and so many bugfixes.

You'll might note that we changed the use of `offence` with `offense`. This was done to keep the spelling
in our code consistent. Hopefully this won't cause anyone problems, but we're obliged to mention it as
the `Offence` class itself got renamed.

Below is the list of all the gory details. Enjoy!

## RuboCop 0.19.0

### New features
- New cop `FileName` makes sure that source files have snake_case names. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `DeprecatedClassMethods` checks for deprecated class methods. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `StringConversionInInterpolation` checks for redundant `Object#to_s` in string interpolation. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `LiteralInInterpolation` checks for interpolated string literals. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `SelfAssignment` checks for places where the self-assignment shorthand should have been used. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `DoubleNegation` checks for uses of `!!`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New cop `PercentLiteralDelimiters` enforces consistent usage of `%`-literal delimiters. ([@hannestyden](https://github.com/hannestyden))
- New Rails cop `ActionFilter` enforces the use of `_filter` or `_action` action filter methods. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- New Rails cop `ScopeArgs` makes sure you invoke the `scope` method properly. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Add `with_fixed_indentation` style to `AlignParameters` cop. ([@hannestyden](https://github.com/hannestyden))
- Add `IgnoreLastArgumentHash` option to `AlignHash` cop. ([@hannestyden](https://github.com/hannestyden))
- [#743](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/743): `SingleLineMethods` cop does auto-correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#743](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/743): `Semicolon` cop does auto-correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#743](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/743): `EmptyLineBetweenDefs` cop does auto-correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#743](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/743): `IndentationWidth` cop does auto-correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#743](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/743): `IndentationConsistency` cop does auto-correction. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#809](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/809): New formatter `fuubar` displays a progress bar and shows details of offenses as soon as they are detected. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#797](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/797): New cop `IndentHash` checks the indentation of the first key in multi-line hash literals. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#797](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/797): New cop `IndentArray` checks the indentation of the first element in multi-line array literals. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#806](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/806): Now excludes files in `vendor/**` by default. ([@jeremyolliver](https://github.com/jeremyolliver))
- [#795](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/795): `IfUnlessModifier` and `WhileUntilModifier` supports `MaxLineLength`, which is independent of `LineLength` parameter `Max`. ([@agrimm](https://github.com/agrimm))
- [#868](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/868): New cop `ClassAndModuleChildren` checks the style of children definitions at classes and modules: nested / compact. ([@geniou](https://github.com/geniou))

### Changes
- [#793](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/793): Add printing total count when `rubocop --format offences`. ([@ma2gedev](http://github.com/ma2gedev))
- Remove `Ignore` param from the Rails `Output` cop. The standard `Exclude/Include` should be used instead. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `FavorSprintf` to `FormatString` and made it configurable. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Renamed `Offence` to `Offense`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Use `offense` in all messages instead of `offence`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- For indentation of `if`/`unless`/`while`/`until` bodies when the result is assigned to a variable, instead of supporting two styles simultaneously, `IndentationWidth` now supports one style of indentation at a time, specified by `EndAlignment`/`AlignWith`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Renamed `Style` param of `DotPosition` cop to `EnforcedStyle`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Add `length` value to locations of offense in JSON formatter. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- `SpaceAroundBlockBraces` cop replaced by `SpaceBeforeBlockBraces` and `SpaceInsideBlockBraces`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- `SpaceAroundEqualsInParameterDefault` cop is now configurable with the `EnforcedStyle` option. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))

### Bugs fixed
- [#790](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/790): Fix auto-correction interference problem between `MethodDefParentheses` and other cops. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#794](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/794): Fix handling of modifier keywords with required parentheses in `ParenthesesAroundCondition`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#804](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/804): Fix a false positive with operator assignments in a loop (including `begin..rescue..end` with `retry`) in `UselessAssignment`. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- [#815](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/815): Fix a false positive for heredocs with blank lines in them in `EmptyLines`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Auto-correction is now more robust and less likely to die because of `RangeError` or "clobbering". ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Offenses always reported in order of position in file, also during `--auto-correct` runs. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix problem with `[Corrected]` tag sometimes missing in output from `--auto-correct` runs. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix message from `EndAlignment` cop when `AlignWith` is `keyword`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Handle `case` conditions in `LiteralInCondition`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#822](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/822): Fix a false positive in `DotPosition` when enforced style is set to `trailing`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- Handle properly dynamic strings in `LineEndConcatenation`. ([@bbatsov](https://github.com/bbatsov))
- [#832](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/832): Fix auto-correction interference problem between `BracesAroundHashParameters` and `SpaceInsideHashLiteralBraces`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix bug in auto-correction of alignment so that only space can be removed. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- Fix bug in `IndentationWidth` auto-correction so it doesn't correct things that `IndentationConsistency` should correct. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#847](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/847): Fix bug in `RegexpLiteral` concerning `--auto-gen-config`. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#848](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/848): Fix bug in `--show-cops` that made it print the default configuration rather than the current configuration. ([@jonas054](https://github.com/jonas054))
- [#862](https://github.com/bbatsov/rubocop/issues/862): Fix a bug where single line `rubocop:disable` comments with indentations were treated as multiline cop disabling comments. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- Fix a bug where `rubocop:disable` comments with a cop name including `all` (e.g. `MethodCallParentheses`) were disabling all cops. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
- Fix a bug where string and regexp literals including `# rubocop:disable` were confused with real comments. ([@yujinakayama](https://github.com/yujinakayama))
